class list_app.views.TaskList(**kwargs)[source]¶

This is a list view of the Task model, and the context object name is ‘tasks’. The context object name is the name of the variable that will be passed to the template. In this case, the template will. receive a variable called tasks, which will contain a list of all the tasks in the database.

context_object_name = 'tasks'¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)[source]¶

We’re overriding the get_context_data function of the ListView class, and adding a new key to the context dictionary called ‘tasks’ which is equal to the queryset of all tasks, but filtered by the current user :return: The context is being returned.

alias of Task
